definition[0]: to consider the possible facts, problems, costs etc involved in something when making a plan, calculation, or judgment
example[0]: Allowing for inflation, the cost of the project will be $2 million.
example[1]: You should always allow for the possibility that it might rain.
definition[1]: to take something into account when doing a calculation or making a decision
example[2]: The electricity company said its prices were 26% lower than six years ago after allowing for inflation.
